verses.name: Amos 5:17
verses.text: And in all vineyards shall be wailing: for I will pass through thee, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Amos 5:18
verses.text: Woe unto you that desire the day of the Lord! to what end is it for you? the day of the Lord is darkness, and not light.

verses.name: Amos 5:19
verses.text: As if a man did flee from a lion, and a bear met him; or went into the house, and leaned his hand on the wall, and a serpent bit him.

verses.name: Amos 5:20
verses.text: Shall not the day of the Lord be darkness, and not light? even very dark, and no brightness in it?
